BlackFang/BlackNigtmare/DarkFate/NightStrike::

"Where do you meet him?" asked the young bot when with out knew it 
he walked towards a tramp.

BlackNightmare yelled "OPEN FIRE!!!! NOW!!!!

Soem shot fallen near BlackFang who ran to cover himself and open 
his comlink to maximals, yelling to Cryaltron and his fellows to 
base "ALERT!!!!!! THE ENEMY HAVE SET US A TRAMP!!!! UNICRON'S 
MINIONS ARE HERE!!!!"
